# ASP Chef Extras

A collection of extra operations that users may decide to register to their ASP Chef.

## Usage

### Register One Operation

Simple as adding a **@config/Register Javascript** operation with *URL(s)* pointing to the desired file (e.g., `https://github.com/alviano/asp-chef/blob/master/extras/Javascript/JSON-to-JS.js`).


### Register Multiple Operations

Fetch the list of URLs with a **List GitHub** operation, then use a **@config/Register Javascript** operation.
[Here](https://asp-chef.alviano.net/#%21) is a recipe that can be used for this purpose.
